title: Logo - some kind of sans serif? maybe in the helvetica family?
author: jncazbah

comments.content:
Britannic Bold (slanted for a faux italic effect):  
 [www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174721/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/bold/ "www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/britannic-lt/bold/")
It looks like Britannic BQ Italic Oblique from Berthold, too fast for me kevin- good find
bojev, I didn't know there was a version with an italic (unusual for a display face). Thanks!
